findings.title: UIF - Unlimited Increase Fees
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase fees without limit. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the `updateFees` function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the `addSniperInList` function.

findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner. The owner may take advantage of it by setting the `maxSellTransactionAmount` to zero.
